properties.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 18 at 3:23AM PST until February 18 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Freeze Warning and the Freeze Watch, temperatures
of 28 to 32.

* WHERE...The south-central Oregon Coast including Reedsport,
North Bend, and Coos Bay. Lakeside is also included for tonight
into Wednesday morning.

* WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST this morning.
For the Freeze Watch, from this evening through Wednesday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freezing conditions could kill frost and
freeze sensitive plants and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing temperatures are most likely to
occur in areas blocked from easterly winds, especially in low
spots such as bogs and hollows.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To be sure
to prevent them from freezing, outdoor water hoses and pipes
should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly.

NWSheadline: FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING
